attorneys: Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied. Motion of Minnesota, et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument denied.
casebody.head_matter:
FORD MOTOR COMPANY, Petitioner,
v.
Adam BANDEMER.
No. 19-369.
Supreme Court of the United States.
April 20, 2020
Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied. Motion of Minnesota, et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument denied.
